invention-title: Hydrogen-deuterium-tritium alloy reactor nuclear fusion system with fuel addition and reaction circulation
一种燃料添加和反应循环进行的氢氘氚合金堆核聚变系统

abstract.p: The invention discloses a hydrogen-deuterium-tritium alloy reactor nuclear fusion system with fuel addition and reaction circulation. The device comprises an ion generator device, a fuel adding chamber, a nuclear fusion reaction chamber, a circulating conveyor belt device, an energy collection device and an energy conversion device, the energy collecting device comprises a cooling liquid metal pressure container and a cooling liquid loop, the cooling liquid metal pressure container comprises a container outer cavity and an equipment cavity located in the middle of the container outer cavity, and the cooling liquid loop is communicated with the container outer cavity of the cooling liquid metal pressure container; the circulating conveying belt device is arranged in the equipment cavity and comprises an annular conveying belt and four idler wheels arranged at the four corners of the annular conveying belt. According to the system, nuclear fusion material adding, nuclear fusion reaction and nuclear fusion energy collection are designed into a circulating process and are realized through a circulating device, and meanwhile, the nuclear fusion intensity is controllable, so that the nuclear fusion device is good in flexibility, material adding and energy collection are convenient, and nuclear fusion energy is convenient to use.

一种燃料添加和反应循环进行的氢氘氚合金堆核聚变系统。它包括离子发生器装置、燃料添加室、核聚变反应室、循环传送带装置、能量采集装置、能量转换装置；所述能量采集装置包括一冷却液金属压力容器、及冷却液回路，所述冷却液金属压力容器包括容器外腔、及处于容器外腔中间的设备腔，所述冷却液回路与冷却液金属压力容器的容器外腔连通；所述循环传送带装置设置于设备腔中，所述循环传送带装置包括环形传送带、及设置于环形传送带四角的四个滚轮。该系统将核聚变添料、核聚变反应、核聚变能量采集设计成一循环过程并通过一可循环装置实现，同时核聚变强度可控，使得核聚变装置灵活性好，添料和能量采集方便，便于核聚变能源的利用。
